channel.title: Introducing Paymo 3 - moving projects forward
channel.description:
Hi guys, we just launched our new version of [Paymo][1] last week. It's on online project management app with a strong time tracking component + invoicing addon. Would love you to check it out http://www.paymoapp.com - feedback welcome.
[1]: http://www.paymoapp.com

item.title: Introducing Paymo 3 - moving projects forward
item.dc:creator: JanLukacs
item.description:
Thanks Corey, glad you like it!

Read full topic

item.title: Introducing Paymo 3 - moving projects forward
item.dc:creator: coreysnipes
item.description:
Congratulations! The product & marketing info look great. It’s nice to hear from the larger, well-established (but still bootstrapped) products like this. It gives me hope.

Read full topic
